source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a dynamic, wide-angle time-lapse of the Colosseum in Rome at night. The ancient amphitheater is illuminated by warm, golden lights, emphasizing its grand arches and structure against the dark sky. The camera's motion and the long exposure create vibrant light trails from passing traffic in the foreground.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a dynamic, wide-angle time-lapse of the Colosseum in Rome at night. The ancient amphitheater is illuminated by warm, golden lights, emphasizing its grand arches and structure against the dark sky. The camera's motion and the long exposure create vibrant light trails from passing traffic in the foreground.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a group of tourists walks around the Colosseum, pausing occasionally to take photographs, which is not visible in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a dynamic, wide-angle time-lapse of the Colosseum in Rome at night. The ancient amphitheater is illuminated by warm, golden lights, emphasizing its grand arches and structure against the dark sky. The camera's motion and the long exposure create vibrant light trails from passing traffic in the foreground. Although not visible in the video, a group of tourists walks around the Colosseum, pausing occasionally to take photographs.
